response.overview: A follow-up to the popular "Shorts For Cats" collection, this enjoyable edition features short films that showcase the creative work of a diverse group of talented, up-and-coming filmmakers. Highlights include "All's Fair," centered on two dedicated soldiers forced to confront the harsh realities of torture; and "The Evaluation," a hilarious look at a work performance evaluation gone horribly wrong.
response.title: More Shorts For Cats
